Field Detail

yaml

protected final org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml yaml
Constructor Detail

SimpleYamlManager

public SimpleYamlManager(File file)
Creates a new SimpleYamlManager with default settings and given file to load the document from.

Note that the constructor won't load the yaml itself. Do do this, you should use load().

Parameters:
file - file to load yaml from

SimpleYamlManager

public SimpleYamlManager(File file,
                         Settings settings)
Creates a new SimpleYamlManager with given settings and file to load the document from.

Note that the constructor won't load the yaml itself. Do do this, you should use load().

Parameters:
file - file to load yaml from
settings - settings to use

SimpleYamlManager

public SimpleYamlManager(String path)
Creates a new SimpleYamlManager with default settings and given classpath resource to load the document from.

Note that the constructor won't load the yaml itself. Do do this, you should use load().

Parameters:
path - path to the resource in classpath to load the yaml from

SimpleYamlManager

public SimpleYamlManager(String path,
                         Settings settings)
Creates a new SimpleYamlManager with given settings and loads yaml from the given classpath resource.

Note that the constructor won't load the yaml itself. Do do this, you should use load().

Parameters:
path - path to the resource in classpath to load the yaml from
settings - settings to use

Method Detail

isCaseSensitive

public boolean isCaseSensitive()
Returns the state of case-sensitive option (off by default).

If this option is on, node names will be case-sensitive.

Returns:
true if on, otherwise false
See Also:
Settings.isCaseSensitive()

public String getSeparator()
Returns the path separator to be used (default ".").

Returns:
the path separator

save

public boolean save()
Description copied from interface: YamlManager
Saves the manager's document to the file it was loaded from.

Fails if the document wasn't loaded from a file or IOException occurred.

Specified by:
save in interface YamlManager
Returns:
true if succeed, false otherwise

load

public boolean load()
Description copied from interface: YamlManager
Loads the manager's document.

Fails if trying to load the document from a stream or a reader more than once, or IOException occurred.

Specified by:
load in interface YamlManager
Returns:
true if succeed, false otherwise

load

protected void load(File file)
             throws IOException
Loads yaml from the given file and sets is as the root node.

Tries to create the file if doesn't exist.

Parameters:
file - file to load the yaml from
Throws:
IOException - if an IOException occurred
